meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it probably uses the kun'yomi reading. You did not learn this reading, so here's a mnemonic to help you to remember: Please hand me the rope, right <reading>now</reading> (なわ), otherwise I will fall to my death!
